name: Ntfy Group Notifications
description: Sends push notifications to specific groups using ntfy. Supports message priority, tags, and titles.
author: Shinkai

serverUrl.description: The ntfy server URL. Defaults to https://ntfy.sh if not provided.

topic.description: The topic/group to send the notification to. Acts as a channel for notifications.

priority.description: Priority level of the notification. Affects how urgently the notification is delivered.

tags.description: Comma-separated list of tags. Can include emoji shortcodes.

success.description: Whether the notification was sent successfully
